com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.parameterizedMessages

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        IParameterizedMessage clone()

      • computeKLDivergence

        double computeKLDivergence(IParameterizedMessage that)
        Computes the KL divergence of this message with respect to a another message of the same type. I.e. it should compute:
        DKL(P || Q)
        where P refers to the distribution described by this message, and Q to the distribution described by that message.
        Parameters:
        that - another message with a compatible type with this message. Typically this means that the class type must match. See specific subclass implementations for details.
        Returns:
        computed KL divergence in units of nats,
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if that is not compatible with this.
        Since:
        0.06

      • setNull

        void setNull()
        Sets message to its "null" form.

        Usually this means the parameters will be set to represent a weak uniform distribution.
